title: Claude Code 2.1.32–2.1.34: Agent Teams, Memory, and Opus 4.6

description: Agent Teams for parallel workflows, persistent Memory across sessions, and Claude Opus 4.6 with 1M token context. A practical guide.

title: Mimir 0.3.5: AI-Powered Transcriptions
description: AI text improvement, translation, custom prompts, and batch history. Mimir gets smarter.
descriptionRu: ИИ-улучшение текста, перевод, кастомные промпты и история транскрипций. Mimir становится умнее.
